chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is experiencing the following issue:
Hello, I was expecting my package to be delivered to my home initially, but I received a notification saying it couldn't be delivered when I was at home and the delivery person didn't contact me. Additionally, the package was later delivered to a different relay point than the one I had indicated. And towards the end of the afternoon when I went to pick it up, the phone wasn't inside and the box had been opened. I'm disoriented because my phone is essential for tomorrow's day; therefore, I would like another phone delivery as soon as possible and request a commercial offer from you due to the complete lack of seriousness in your delivery. I am completely disappointed with your services.

Thank you for your help,

Bonjour,

Le client prétend que le colis a été livré vide. Nous avons demandé le certificat de non-réception BM, des photos de l’emballage, une photo de l’étiquette avec numéro de suivi visible, des photos de l’emballage à l’intérieur (avec le produit reçu à l’intérieur, le cas échéant) et un rapport de police.

Une fois que nous aurons rassemblé tous les documents, nous vous ferons savoir si le client préfère un remboursement ou une réexpédition. Le délai est de 24 heures à compter de la réception des documents

Cordialement,
Miora, service client Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner about this situation. They have requested the following documents:

1. Photographs of all four sides of the parcel. 
2. Photographs of all four sides of its contents. 
3. A clearer picture of the shipping label on the parcel. 
4. Handwritten BackMarket CND with the IMEI included.

 Kindly check with the customer if they left any comments on the delivery note as well.

Thank you for your assistance.

Regards,
JY

Hello

The package has not yet been successfully delivered, and all refund conditions described in our lost parcel policy have been met. All relevant documents were provided by the client and communicated as part of this conversation.

You can use the documents in detail to review the issue with your delivery company.

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within one business day, or this order will be refunded.

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Miora, Back Market Customer Service.

Dear Backcare,

Kindly inform the customer to keep the parcel. Also, please provide us with the necessary documents mentioned above:

 1.A clearer picture of the shipping label on the parcel. 

Please also check with the customer if they left any comments on the delivery note. These documents are essential to open an investigation. We seek your understanding and assistance.

Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile

The customer stated that the package was empty upon receipt. The documents necessary to open an investigation with the carrier are available in this after-sales service.

The customer wants a new shipment of his order, thank you to do the necessary within 24 hours and provide us a tracking number.

Regards,
Joël, Back Market Customer Service.

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we do not have enough stock to process a replacement. I have proceeded with a refund instead.

Regards,
RK
